projects.title: Control System for Office Domotics
projects.summary: Implementation of a Customizable and Scalable Voice Controlled Automation Control System for Office Domotics
projects.detail: The project aims to transform existing manually controlled office domotics into an advanced system capable of remote control, automation, and voice control. By integrating control hardware featuring networking capabilities and a touchscreen interface, the project enhances operational efficiency and convenience. This system is designed to be scalable, allowing for the addition of more ZigBee actuators to accommodate varying needs. It also excels in data acquisition, capable of collecting information from sensors and streaming real-time data for advanced processing. A key highlight of this upgrade is the development of a modern and innovative user interface (UI). This UI cleverly blends reusable components with custom elements tailored to specific locations, ensuring a user-friendly experience that enhances interaction with the office environment. Additionally, the system includes voice control capabilities with one-shot inference based word detection, speech-to-text (STT), and natural language processing (NLP), further enhancing the ease of use and interaction with the system.

projects.title: CherishedLoveLocks
projects.summary: Innovative Web3 dApp for Metaverse-Integrated NFTs
projects.detail: The aim of this project is to develop a Web3 decentralized application (dApp) that introduces a new generation of NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens) designed specifically for the metaverse. These NFT goods will transcend traditional collectibles by offering interactive, immersive, and utility-driven experiences in virtual environments. The project is focused on creating NFTs that can be used in various metaverse platforms, enhancing user engagement through unique digital assets that offer more than aesthetic value. The project will explore innovative ways to integrate these NFTs into the metaverse, ensuring they are versatile, interactive, and provide real-world utility, thereby setting a new standard for digital ownership.

projects.title: Reticle Vectorization Tool
projects.summary: Advanced reticle vectorization Tool to to bridge the gap between ballistic experts and the technical requirements of embedded systems
projects.detail: This project is dedicated to developing a sophisticated reticle vectorizer, a software tool designed to convert reticles from bitmap file formats into the internal vector formats used by various devices. The primary goal is to bridge the gap between ballistic experts and the technical requirements of embedded systems. Ballistic experts will have the capability to design reticles using familiar and accessible graphic formats, without needing deep knowledge of embedded systems. The vectorizer will then translate these designs into compatible vector formats, allowing technicians to easily upload them into different devices. This conversion process aims to streamline reticle design, ensuring that custom designs are easily transferable and functional across a variety of platforms, thereby enhancing the efficiency and customization capabilities in ballistic equipment.
